content: Unfortunately, he’s not too pleased that you’re in possession of the gold, and the Yellow-Robed Squire will challenge you to a duel!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drunken_Boar_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Drunken Boar Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Return to Rockrest Flat'.
The content is as follows:
Unfortunately, he’s not too pleased that you’re in possession of the gold, and the Yellow-Robed Squire will challenge you to a duel!
